original_text: Therefore the men of Jabesh said, To morrow we will come out unto you, and ye shall do with us all that seemeth good unto you.
korean_text: 야베스 사람들이 이에 이르되 우리가 내일 너희에게 나아가리니 너희 생각에 좋을 대로 우리에게 다 행하라 하니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore the men of Jabesh said
Tomorrow we will come out unto you
and ye shall do with us
all that seemeth good unto you
